BooseApp

Class AppPeek

Namespace
BradleyLeach_BooseApp
Assembly
BradleyLeach_BooseApp.dll

Command class for reading a value from an array at a specified index (peek operation) and assigning it to a variable. Inherits from AppArray and implements the peek logic for both int and real arrays.

public class AppPeek : AppArray, ICommand

Methods

CheckParameters(string[])

Checks that the correct number of parameters are provided for the peek command.

public override void CheckParameters(string[] Parameters)

Parameters

Parameters string[]

The list of parameters to check.

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown if the number of parameters is not 3 or 4.

Compile()

Compiles the peek command, processing array parameters for a peek operation.

public override void Compile()

Execute()

Executes the peek command, reading the value from the array and assigning it to the target variable.

public override void Execute()

Exceptions

CommandException

Thrown if the array type is not recognized.
